# kAudioSessionBeginInterruption

**Global Variable**

Your app’s audio session has just been interrupted, such as by a phone call.

## Declaration

```swift
var kAudioSessionBeginInterruption: Int { get }
```

## Constants

- **kAudioSessionEndInterruption**: The interruption to your app’s audio session has just ended. In the case where a user confirms the interruption, such as answering a phone call, your app will not receive this constant.
